banner.homTitle: Okutunga kwenda okupotolola evi vyatyamelã k’uloñgo
banner.homPresentation: Upange wetu walitepa k’olonepa vivali, ndakuti: okutunga, ndetchi olondjo levi vikwavo, kwenda-vo okupotolola evi vyatyamelã k’umesene w’ovikwata viñgi-viñgi. Otchimahõ tchetu okusandjwisa vana vosi vatusandiliya, l’okuvavela upange waswapo kwenda wokaliye.

About.title: Satyamelã kupangue wetu
About.homPresentation: Upange wetu walitepa k’olonepa vivali, ndakuti: okutunga, ndetchi olondjo levi vikwavo, kwenda-vo okupotolola evi vyatyamelã k’umesene w’ovikwata viñgi-viñgi. Otchimahõ tchetu okusandjwisa vana vosi vatusandiliya, l’okuvavela upange waswapo kwenda wokaliye.
About.weHistoryContext: Luís José: Okutunga l’okupotolola evi vyatyamelã k’umesene LDA ale LJOkutunga l’okupotolola. Etu tukasi tunde k’unhamo w’olohulukãyi vivali l’akwi avali l’anhamo atatu. Otchimahõ tchetu okukwavela upange waswapo ndeti k’okutunga olondjo levi vikwavo, kwenda-vo okupotolola l’okutumbulula evi vyatyamelã k’umesene w’Esapulo kwenda evi vyalityamã latcho.
About.description: Upange wetu walitepa k’olonepa vivali, ndakuti: okutunga, ndetchi olondjo levi vikwavo, kwenda-vo okupotolola evi vyatyamelã k’umesene w’ovikwata viñgi-viñgi. Otchimahõ tchetu okusandjwisa vana vosi vatusandiliya, l’okuvavela upange waswapo kwenda wokaliye.
About.weHistoryContext2: Tukwete olomesene vyakokelwa, tchikale mulo v’ofeka, tchikale-vo k’olofeka vyo k’osamwa. Handi-vo tukwete ekwatiso ekwatiso ly’olonoñgo vitunda ndetcho k’ofeka y’Osipanha, otcho vitunenele umesene wavelapo.
About.weHistoryContext3: K’upange wetu tukwete-vo eliyandjo ly’olonungi ale olondingupange viñgi-viñgi, vina vitenda ale anhamo akahandangalala ûpange w’okutunga, tchikale mulo v«ofeka, tchikale-vo k’olofeka vyo k’osamwa, ndetchi k’Osipanha, kuna tutenda ekwatiso linene,
About.weVisionContext: Okupotolola evi vyatyamelã k’okutunga alupale kwenda okukonomwisa evi vy’umesene, okwavela ku vosi ovikwata vyaswa-po kwenda vyakolelwa. Handi-vo otchimahõ tchetu undingahuminho letchi tchatyamela k’okukula kw’omanu, enene vali okuvâvela epuluvi ly’okukula kwenda okusanga ekali liwa.
About.weMissionContext: Okulinga okuti upange w«okutunga olupale kwenda okutumbulula umesene wevi vyatyamelã kw’asapulo vipitile k’omanu vosi omu mwaleluka kwenda mwaswa-po, kwenda-vo okuvavela evi vy«uloñgo wokaliye.
About.weMissionContext2: Okuswisa-po ondjongole ya vosi, tchikale ondjongole y’okukwata ondjo, tchikale eyi y’okukwata ukulihisõ vumesene, otcho tchalinga otchimahõ tchetu. Evi ndeti kokwetu vyalinga ndesesamelõ ale epuluvi lya vosi.

Strategy.title: Eciyo lyokulitelela
Strategy.homEstrategiesContext: Otcho tuswise-po ondjongole, twasandiliya l’utate evi vyatyamelã k’ovitanda, okukulihisisã ovisukila vya vosi, vina vyalita l’umesene w’esapulo kwenda-vo w’okutumbulula evi l’ovyo.
Strategy.homEstrategiesContext2: Twakulihã okuti etali evi vyatyamelã k’ovitanda vyalinga vy«okulivelavela-po. Omo lyatcho tchisukila elipongiyo l’okukula k’ûmesene otcho tupotolole ovisukilamwenho. Apa ndeti etu tukwete omanu valilongisa kwenda vatõla-po k’Upange û w’okusanga ondjila vaswa-po.
Strategy.description:
Realizamos uma pesquisa extensa no mercado para identificar as necessidades dos clientes no setor de Construção, soluções tecnológicas (Tic), reparações de dispositivos eletrônicos, assim como Venda de materiais referente às áreas que trabalhamos.

Somos conscientes que o mercado é competitivo e exige a necessidade de adaptação rápida no processo evolutivo tecnológico para atender a demanda dos clientes, é por esta razão que nossos especialistas têm trabalhado arduamente para implementar as melhores soluções em cada projeto.

Contact.contWeDoDif: Û wosi otunga mwiñgi otunga omu mwaswa-po.

Goals.title: Metas
Goals.GoalDesc0: Okukulihisã ovisukilamwenho vya vosi otcho tuvavele epotololo lyaswa-po.
Goals.homGoalItemContext2: Okukapa oseo y’evi vyatyamelã k’olombongo l’uhwasi ukwavo omu mwaswa-po.
Goals.homGoalItemContext3: Okutunga otchimuka tchaswa-po kwenda tchalyetcha olumwe k’ûpange wosi.
Goals.homGoalItemContext4: Okukolisa ale okupamisa olondjila vy’okutalika kwenda okulandisa ovohwasi osi tukwete.
Goals.homGoalItemContext5: Ekwamelelõ lava vosi valinga âkamba vetu v’okwenda k’ûpange wosi, otcho lomwe kakasange ekatanga, kwenda-vo vosi tuvavela epondolo ly’okukula oloneke vyosi.
Goals.homGoalItemContext6: Kwava vosi vatusandiliya, evi tukwete tuvyetcha l’utate, tchavela-po ñgo nda atosi osi aswiswa-po.
Goals.homGoalItemContext7: Pange-pange tukwete otchikele tch’okumalã otcho tutaliliye apa patãyi upange wetu, otcho vyosi vyende kovaso, enene vali otcho evi vikeya vipwe evelo.
